## Plot

```{r}
hist(Xsum_total, prob = TRUE, nclass = 50, xlim = c(0, 80), ylim = c(0, 0.065))
x <- seq(0, 80, by = 0.1)
lines(x, dchisq(x, df = 37), col = "red")
legend("topright", inset = 0.05, legend = c("Xsum", "Chi-square(37)"), col = c("black", "red"), lty = 1)
plot(density(Xsum_total), xlim = c(0, 80), ylim = c(0, 0.065), main = "Density Estimation of Xsum")
lines(x, dchisq(x, df = 37), col = "red")
```

## Randomization

```{r, randomization}
set.seed(Xmin_total)
N <- nrow(class_roll) 
class_roll$group <- 
  sample(1:N) %%
  2 %>%
  factor(levels = c(0, 1), labels = c("Red", "Black"))
red_and_black(Xmin_total)
```

### 학년

```{r, year}
tbl0 <- class_roll$year %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl0 %>%
  pander
X0min <- tbl0 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X0min
```

### 학번

```{r, id}
class_roll$id_2 <-
  class_roll$id %>%
  substr(1, 4) %>%
  ifelse(. <= 2017, "2017", .)
tbl1 <- class_roll %$%
  table(.$group, .$id_2) %>%
  `colnames<-`(c("2017 이전", 2018:2023)) 
tbl1 %>%
  pander
X1min <- tbl1 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X1min
```

### 학번 홀짝

```{r, odd or even}
tbl2 <- class_roll$id %>%
  as.numeric %>%
  `%%`(2) %>%
  factor(levels = c(1, 0), labels = c("홀", "짝")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl2 %>%
  pander
X2min <- tbl2 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X2min
```

### e-mail 서비스업체

```{r, e_mail}
isp <- class_roll$email %>%
  strsplit("@", fixed = TRUE) %>%
  sapply("[", 2) %>%
  strsplit("[.]", fixed = FALSE) %>%
  sapply("[", 1)
tbl4 <- isp %>%
  `%in%`(c("naver", "gmail")) %>%
  ifelse(isp, "기타서비스") %>%
  factor(levels = c("naver", "gmail", "기타서비스"),
         labels = c("네이버", "구글", "기타서비스")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl4 %>%
  pander
X4min <- tbl4 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = FALSE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X4min
```

### 전화번호의 분포

```{r, cell_no}
cut_label <- paste(paste0(0:9, "000"), paste0(0:9, "999"), 
                   sep = "~")
tbl5 <- class_roll$cell_no %>%
  substr(start = 8, stop = 11) %>%
  sapply(as.numeric) %>%
  cut(labels = cut_label, 
      breaks = seq(0, 10000, by = 1000)) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl5 %>%
  pander
X5min <- tbl5 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X5min
```

### 성씨 분포

```{r, name}
f_name <- class_roll$name %>%

  factor(levels = c("김", "이", "박", "최", "정", "기타")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl6 %>%
  pander
X6min <- tbl6 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X6min
```
